info.narration: #0 is going into $0's containment unit to begin the task.

collection.name: Queen Bee
collection.openText: If you feel a sharp pain in the stomach or a tickling sensation in the neck, the only available action will be to look up at the blue sky one last time.

observe.desc: [{No immediate change was found from the employee who inhaled spores, and several tests failed to detect any notable symptoms.}]

[{Counseling Log_ <Redacted> talked about a tickling sensation at the neck for some time. I also saw <Redacted> taking several digestives... Who would have thought that would be such a serious issue? I never knew I would be the one to witness that horrible moment. (Omitted) We were just chatting, but then [Redacted] stopped talking. He was still scratching his neck. His neck was so red, that I was worried he might have an infection or something. Then he started to twist his neck in a strange direction. That was when I realized the severity of the situation. He could not have been twisting his neck that way on his own. It looked like someone else was forcefully twisting his neck.}]
[{And then I heard the sound of something tearing, like the noise you might hear when shredding paper, and his head just popped off. It fell on the ground with a damp plop. }]

specialTipSize.specialTip: When the work result was normal, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a normal probability.
When the work result was bad, $0's Qliphoth counter has decreased with a high probability.
When the Qliphoth counter reached zero, $0 emitted red spores all over the department.

Upon observing the Abnormality, it has been confirmed that if the spore is attached to an employee for a certain amount of time, it deals Red damage to its victim. In addition, the spore-eroded employee was significantly slower to move and reduced HP could not be cured by regenerator and bullets.
When #0's HP has been depleted, a giant drone burst out of #0's body. Drones attacked the employees nearby. From the corpse of the employees attacked by drones, more drones emerged.
